About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Frontend Developer with experience in ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as WordPress. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Skilled in developing responsive and user-friendly web applications, with a focus on creating clean and efficient code. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects within tight deadlines. Passionate about learning new technologies and staying up-to-date with industry trends.

    Dynamic Global Links

    Frontend React Developer

  • Utilized ReactJS to develop high-quality, responsive websites that met client requirements and exceeded user expectations.
  • Worked closely with designers and stakeholders to create visually appealing interfaces and intuitive user experiences.
  • Leveraged Git and GitHub to manage version control, track changes, and collaborate with team members on various projects.
  • Successfully developed and deployed a website for the company using ReactJS, which helped to improve online visibility and drive business growth.
  • Continuously researched and adopted new technologies and best practices to enhance frontend development processes and stay up-to-date with industry trends.

    WUBAC

    Frontend Developer

  • Gained hands-on experience in working in an agile development environment, utilizing various development methodologies to deliver high-quality projects on time.

    360 BPO Solutions

    Customer Service Representative

  • Provided exceptional customer service to clients by promptly responding to inquiries and addressing concerns in a timely and professional manner.
